content.question: Which of the following illustrates an application of behavioral principles in the treatment of an anxiety disorder?

choices.label: Using light-exposure therapy to treat major depressive disorder
Using systematic desensitization to treat a specific phobia
Using cognitive therapy to treat posttraumatic stress disorder
Using aversion therapy to treat alcohol use disorder

content.answer: Using systematic desensitization to treat a specific phobia

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
